class D;
int x;
endclass
class C;
rand int x, y;
D a, b;
constraint c1 { (x < y && (a.x > b.x || a.x ==5)) -> x+y == 10; }

class Packet;
rand bit mode;
rand int length;
constraint deflt {
soft length inside {32,1024};
soft mode -> length == 1024;
// Note: soft mode -> {length == 1024;} is not legal syntax,
// as soft must be followed by an expression
}
endclass
